dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 283 EH: Electing a Member to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: In the House of Representatives, U. S.,
form.official-title: Electing a Member to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

section.text: That the following named Member be, and is hereby, elected to the following standing committee of the House of Representatives:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. McCormick (to rank immediately after Mr. Self).
